Funtion.Detail: Interacting selectively and non-covalently with any mono-, di- or trisaccharide carbohydrate.
Interacting selectively and non-covalently with any carbohydrate, any of a group of organic compounds based of the general formula Cx(H2O)y.

BioProcess.Detail: Any process that modulates the frequency, rate or extent of the antiviral response of a cell or organism.
BioProcess.Keyword: Regulation of defense response to virus
